history.content: I took 161 and 162 the same semester around a year back, and I think that taking the two together is generally a bad idea (based on personal experience) — while the content overlaps, project/assignment due dates are pretty much aligned, so the amount of work fluctuates from almost none to a lot within the span of weeks.

I'm graduating next semester and need to take 3 techs to satisfy requirements. I'd say the three techs I'm most interested in taking are listed in the title. I'd like to get a taste of the embedded systems space, possibly robotics. I know that 162 is very project heavy, and 149 picks up near the end. Should I even consider taking these 3 classes together? If not, can someone offer a less intense schedule? If EE 120 works better in place of 149 then I wouldn't mind taking that instead. (Priority: 162 > 161 >= 149 > 120). Thanks.
history.subject: CS 161 + CS 162 + EECS 149
